dublin_core.dcvalue: This one page document provides a starting place for those looking to develop gender based information communication technology ICT indicators The document lists components of the Regentic Gender Digital Divide Indicators organized by topic Topics include decision making and policy content skills and connectivity The document is adapted from Table 3 on Page 38 of the article Women and Gender in ICT Statistics and Indicators for Development How it helps with planning Ideas for gender based ICT indicators
